post.body: @ollietrex I like the idea of a duvet day! Alas I am up and dressed.
It's Christmas worry about it in the New Year, I've put loads of weight on already!
Thank you. Hope you have a great Christmas to and I'll see you on MHS in the New Year.
Wearing my new winter bike boots round the house, they are lovely and comfy - thanks to Ali's mum.
I have a sore Ali, don't think she'll be biking today. The question is what shall I do?
Nice food, some bubbles and a very sore Ali. Happy New Year everyone.
Great ride, but feeling a bit lazy compared to Ali!
So tired, getting up was hard after hardly sleeping. But biking will be fun.
Plotting a ride, its taking ages.
House is slowly warming up, it was so cold when we got home.
back home at last, feeling a little odd.
Back out on bike an easy 25miles. Now out for a curry with Ali and her dad.
Have a wonderful Christmas everyone.
Have a Merry Christmas everyone, I am now without internet access for a week.
A ride and a run, now lots to do.
Pizza, bubbles nowmaking presents lovely evening.
I'm so glad my transport is a bike the cars are all sat in traffic jams, just back from a 30mile trip to get Ali's present from her mum.
Off to Chorley now to pick up Ali's present from her mum. When will I get mine finished? Wish the weather looked a bit nicer!
Ice has helped, going to wait a while before heading to Chorley, Ali has took the car so I will be on the bike.
Right knee sore but hopefully it'll sort itself out, I have lots to do today.
